title: typo in tip's article on recover
body:
http://tip.golang.org/doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.html

"When malformed JSON is encountered, the parser calls panic is to unwind the stack
to the top-level function call, which recovers from the panic and returns an appropriate
error value (see the 'error' and 'unmarshal' functions in decode.go)."

Bad: "panic is to unwind"

Gooder: "panic to unwind"
